author: rjmholt
body:
From https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/13039.

.NET does not implicitly allow cross-filesystem directory moves: https://github.com/dotnet/runtime/issues/31149.

This was mitigated in https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/pull/13044, but when .NET updates their implementation, we should fall back to using their API as before.

comments.author: doctordns
comments.body: Has the .NET team updated their implementation?

title: Move back to .NET's DirectoryInfo.MoveTo code when .NET bug is fixed
